Bag O' Links - 19/8/2009 Elad Meidar

19 Aug 2009

  • validates_associated with normal error messages – a quick dirty fix to that stupid “ is invalid” message. check the comments for some more tweaks.
  • how i grew to hate every programming language – as if he read my mind.
  • Javascript MVC – as if i wasn’t already confused.
  • cucumber tips – mine: put it in a salad, throw it away and order a steak.
  • IE6 offenders – report companies that force the usage of IE6.
  • RegExps exposed – a guide to this never ending riddle called Regular expressions.
  • jSquared – a jQuery plugin that offers similar functionality to Google’s Squared.
  • anyThingSlider – another jQuery slider with awesome features.
  • 10 mod_rewrite tips you need to know – unless of course, you are an Nginx fan.
  • Web fonts and standards – i miss @font-face too… COME BACK!

GitHub Treasures

  • Clickistrano – imple Sinatra app for one-click Capistrano deployments, hopefully better than the dead Webistrano
  • AuthLogic trial – example application that shows how to use authlogic to support user’s trial periods.
  • admin_assistant – another admin interface generator.
  • CarrierWave – Powerful solution for file uploads in Ruby for Rack, Rails, Merb and Sinatra, (finally a good Rack usage :) )
  • DB Charmer – a db master-slave/connections manager.
